summary.prescription: Make sure to return meaningful value instead
Don't return infinity if velocity is close to zero
Include distance to goal independent of velocity
Include orientation difference into cost function
Include steer angle cost into cost function
Include steer velocity cost into cost function
Include time cost into cost calculation
Include path efficiency into cost calculation
Include velocity difference to goal into cost calculation

output.improved_heuristic_function:
def heuristic_function(self, node_current: PriorityNode) -> float: 
         path = node_current.list_paths[-1] 
         state = path[-1] 
         time_diff = 0 
         distance = 0 
         path_efficiency = self.calc_path_efficiency(path) 
         if self.position_desired is None: 
             if state.time_step not in self.time_desired: 
                 time_diff = abs(sum(self.time_desired) / 2 - state.time_step) 
             #return time_diff + 5/path_efficiency 
         else: 
             distance = self.calc_heuristic_distance(state) 
             time_diff = self.calc_time_cost(path) 
         steer_vel_cost = self.calc_steering_velocity_cost(path) 
         steer_angle_cost = self.calc_steering_angle_cost(path) 
         vel_diff = 0 
         if state.velocity not in self.velocity_desired: 
            vel_diff = abs(sum(self.velocity_desired) / 2 - state.velocity) 
         orientation_difference = self.calc_orientation_diff(self.calc_angle_to_goal(state), state.orientation) 
         orientation_difference = (orientation_difference + np.pi) % (2 * np.pi) - np.pi 
         return 3*distance + 15*orientation_difference + 10/path_efficiency + 4*time_diff + 5*steer_angle_cost + 5*steer_vel_cost + vel_diff
